enchantment.nadir.bulk_curse.desc: Increases armor slightly, but decreases movement speed.
enchantment.nadir.sharpshooter.desc: Arrows ignore gravity and travel in a straight line.
enchantment.nadir.anti_entropy_curse.des: Afflicts attackers with fire, but applies strong slowness to you.
enchantment.nadir.enlargement_curse.desc: Increases reach, but significantly reduces attack and mining speed.
enchantment.nadir.flow.desc: Increases movement speed in water while held.
enchantment.nadir.magic_protection.desc: Greatly decreases damage taken from magic.
enchantment.nadir.spring.desc: Increases jump height and safe fall distance.
enchantment.nadir.step.desc: Increases your step height, allowing you to walk up full blocks.
